text: UBI would give everyone financial security and the freedom to pursue meaningful work. It's time to modernize our social safety net for the 21st century economy.
Giving people free money would destroy the incentive to work. UBI is just socialism dressed up in a new package.
Several pilot programs have tested UBI in different countries. Finland ran a two-year experiment, while Kenya has an ongoing study. Results have been mixed.
Solar and wind power are now cheaper than coal. The transition to clean energy is inevitable and will create millions of jobs while saving the planet.
Rushing to abandon fossil fuels will destroy our economy. We need a balanced approach that doesn't sacrifice reliability for green fantasies.
Big Tech companies have too much power over public discourse. We need regulations to protect free speech and prevent censorship.
Government regulation of social media would be the real threat to free speech. Private companies should be free to moderate their platforms.
The debate about remote work continues as companies announce various policies. Some have gone fully remote, while others require office attendance.
AI can detect diseases earlier and more accurately than human doctors. We should embrace this technology to save lives and reduce healthcare costs.
Replacing human judgment with algorithms in healthcare is dangerous. AI systems can be biased and make mistakes that cost lives.
